parse.title: The Lord of the Rings Chess Collection

links.*: The Lord of the Rings (film series)

wikitext.*:
'''The Lord of the Rings Chess Collection''' is a high-quality, hand-painted, chess set with pieces based on characters from [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]]. It is part of the official merchandise. Due to the popularity of the first chess set, a second one is currently in the works. Both sets are UK exclusive.

==Pieces==
===Set One===
====White====
* King - [[Aragorn]]
* Queen - [[Arwen]]
* Bishops - [[Gandalf]], [[Legolas]]
* Knights - [[Théoden]], [[Éomer]]
* Rooks - [[Minas Tirith]], [[Osgiliath]]
* Pawns - [[Faramir]], [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]], [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]], [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]], [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Merry]], [[Éowyn]], [[Gimli]], Gondorian Archer
====Black====
* King - [[Sauron]]
* Queen - [[Witch-king]] of [[Angmar]]
* Bishops - [[Orcs|Orc]] Lieutenant, [[Gothmog (Lieutenant of Morgul)|Gothmog]]
* Knights - [[Shagrat]], A Black Uruk
* Rooks - [[Orthanc]], [[Barad-dûr]]
* Pawns - Orc Drum Beater, Orc Archer, Orc Axeman, [[Gollum]], [[Gorbag]], Orc Swordsman, Orc Archer, Orc Drum Beater
===Set Two===
====White====
* King - [[Elrond]]
* Queen - [[Galadriel]]
* Bishops - [[Treebeard]], [[Ents|Ent]]
* Knights - [[Shadowfax]], [[Snowmane]]
* Rooks - [[Grey Havens]], [[Eagles|Eagle]] [[Tower of Ecthelion|Ecthelion]]
* Pawns - [[Boromir]], [[Gamling]], [[Haldir]], Elven archer, [[Celeborn]], [[Helm's Deep]] Archer, [[Númenóreans|Numenorian ''(sic)'']] Knight, [[Rangers of Ithilien|Ranger of Ithilien]] 
====Black====
* King - [[Saruman]]
* Queen - [[Shelob]]
* Bishops - [[Lurtz]], Berserker [[Uruk-hai]]
* Knights - [[Wargs|Warg]], [[Nazgûl|Ringwraith]] horse
* Rooks - [[Durin's Bane|Balrog]], [[Fell Beasts|Fell Beast]]
* Pawns - Siege [[Trolls|Troll]], [[Easterlings|Easterling ''(sic)'']], [[Cave-trolls|Cave Troll]], [[Haradrim]] Archer, [[Gríma|Wormtongue]], Armoured Troll, Battle Troll, Crossbow Uruk-hai
